TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SystemWebSectionGroup extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSectionGroup
Public NotInheritable Class SystemWebSectionGroup Inherits ConfigurationSectionGroup

summary.span: 允许用户以编程方式访问配置文件的 组。

span.span: Allows the user to programmatically access the group of the configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是指`system.web`组配置文件中。The class refers to the `system.web` group within a configuration file. 此类型可用于访问此组中包含部分的任一部分。You can use this type to access any of the sections contained in this group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序与关联的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application. 你可以使用此对象访问中包含的部分`system.web`组。You can use this object to access the sections contained in the `system.web` group. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup/CS/SystemWebSectionGroup.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebSectionGroup/VB/SystemWebSectionGroup.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET 配置系统并不应在代码中直接使用。This constructor is called by the ASP.NET configuration system and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 你可以获取的实例类通过方法。You can obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnonymousIdentification As AnonymousIdentificationSection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象引用配置文件的 `anonymousIdentification` 节。The object refers to the `anonymousIdentification` section of the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
